sentences.sentence: Between 1990 and 1998, road haulage increased by 19.4%.
sentences.translation: 从1990年到1998年，公路运输量增长了19.4%。

sentences.sentence: Between 1990 and 1998, road haulage increased by 19.4%, while during the same period rail haulage decreased by 43.5%.
sentences.translation: 在1990年到1998年间，公路运输增加了19.4%，而同期铁路货运量下降了43.5%。
